categories: Category:5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back

nodes.text: 5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back is a collection of twelve young-readers Star Wars stories. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on December 15, 2017, as a follow-up to 5-Minute Star Wars Stories.

A brand new collection of twelve action-packed retellings that span the entire Star Wars saga—including two tales from Star Wars: The Last Jedi! These exciting stories can each be read in just five minutes—perfect for galactic adventures at lightspeed!

5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back is a collection of twelve stories adapting parts of all eight films of the Star Wars saga released at the time, spanning from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace to Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. Several of the stories featured art by Pilot Studio that was previously published in the World of Reading young readers Trapped in the Death Star!, Captured on Cloud City, Finn and Poe Team Up! and The Fight in the Forest accompanied by new retellings of the events written for older children.

An abridged eBook version of the title was also published, consisting only of the five stories that adapted events from the sequel films Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.
